<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description/><name>Open Widgets to Public</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[// This script will make several widgets available to the public,
// Users that are not authenticated 
// Please read about each grant


// The following 2 grants open up the search widget so user can search from the home page
setWidgetToPublic("200fbd96cb20020000f8d856634c9ca1"); //Homepage Search Widget
setWidgetToPublic("fa20ec02cb31020000f8d856634c9ce9"); //Typeahead Search Widget

function setWidgetToPublic (widgetID){
	var curWidget = new GlideRecord('sp_widget');
	curWidget.get(widgetID);	
	curWidget.setValue('public','true');
	curWidget.update();
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jspirko</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-07 16:24:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>eb93dc221ba07814e0f943f28d4bcb8a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Open Widgets to Public</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Public Service Template" source="x_snc_311_template">e03b49a81ba7a810e0f943f28d4bcb66</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Public Service Template">e03b49a81ba7a810e0f943f28d4bcb66</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_eb93dc221ba07814e0f943f28d4bcb8a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jspirko</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-07 16:24:36</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>
